protein.specific_function: Exonuclease with a preference for double stranded DNA with mismatched 3' termini. May play a role in DNA repair

reference.reference_text: Hoss M, Robins P, Naven TJ, Pappin DJ, Sgouros J, Lindahl T: A human DNA editing enzyme homologous to the Escherichia coli DnaQ/MutD protein. EMBO J. 1999 Jul 1;18(13):3868-75.
